DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study of OPTIVE PLUS® in patients with dry eye disease in a routine clinical setting. Treatment decisions are made by the physician and reflect the physician's current standard of care.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of OPTIVE PLUS® for the Treatment of Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of dry eye Physician decision to treat with OPTIVE PLUS® in accordance with the physician's standard practice
